==Lore==
===Shrine Maidens===
The Shrine Maidens of [[Watatsumi Island]] are trained at the Sangonomiya Shrine, as they worship [[Orobashi]] rather than the [[Sacred Sakura]].
*[[Izumi Naki]]
*[[Mochizuki]]
*[[Tsuyuko]]
*[[Shizuru]]
*[[Miwa]]

==Trivia==
*Sangonomiya Shrine was revealed in the [[Version 1.6]] Special Program.
*Sangonomiya Shrine may be inspired by {{Lang|{{w|Ryūgū-jō|Ryuuguu-jou}}|ja=龍宮城|ja_tl=Dragon Palace Castle}}, the undersea palace of the dragon god of the sea {{w|Ryūjin|Ryuujin}} in Japanese folklore. The palace is described as being made out of gold, crystal, coral and pearl, with sloping roofs.
